title: F/S - t206 Cobb Bat off PSA 4 SOLD
author: trambo

posts.post_title: F/S - t206 Cobb Bat off PSA 4 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Just upgraded (like always) so time to move this to a new home.  

Asking $6400 (card is sold).  Price includes registered mail with insurance.  

Would consider trades for anything I need in t205 or t206 (PSA only 5 or better).  Still looking for a Green Cobb in PSA 4-5 too so this could be used in part (with cash) for one of those.  

Happy to discuss with anyone who may be interested.  Would appreciate an email at [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] versus PM's here (I sometimes forget to check the PM's here). 

Thanks!
